name: depthscraper
description:
how to play?  🎮
  • Choose a tile from the bottom right
  • Place it on the board
  • Completing a row, adds a new one to the bottom
  • Complete challenges to not run out of moves
  • Bigger areas of the same colors give more points
  • Go deeper and deeper!
mobile? 📱

we are thinking of making this into a mobile game, if you’re
interested in hearing from out when we release something,
you can kindly leave your email here  💌.
